content: वास्तव्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Dwelling, inhabiting, resident; पुरेऽस्य वास्तव्यकुटुबितां ययुः <ls>Śi. 1. 66.</ls> {@--2@} Fit to be inhabited, habitable. --व्यः A dweller, resident, an inhabitant; नानादिगंतवास्तव्यो महाजनसमाजः <ls>Māl. 1.</ls> --व्यं {@--1@} A habitable place, house. {@--2@} Habitation, residence (वसति).
